pages.text: Here is where I shall explain Allomancy, a system of Investiture native to Scadrial. Despite first documentation only occurring approximately one thousand years before the Catacendre, Allomancy has been explored in much greater detail than it's two older counterparts.
pages.title: Allomancy (For Dummies)

pages.text: The art requires consuming a piece of metal, upon which time you can "$(thing)Burn$()" it. Those who are genetically gifted with a singular allomantic ability are generally referred to as a "$(thing)Misting$()". For someone who has access to all sixteen abilities, they are referred to as a "$(thing)Mistborn$()".
pages.title: Allomancy (For Dummies)
